[SYNTAX]: Overly complex sentence structures may impede smooth reading.
[LEXICON]: Archaic vocabulary and formal tone might reduce readability for some readers.

[TRANSITION]: Abrupt phrase ("The ambient light changed hue.") without clear connection to context.
[CLARITY]: Some paragraphs shift focus (e.g., from style to biography) without explicit transitions.

[SYNTAX]: Slightly overly complex sentence structures (e.g., "If the models...").

[LOGIC]: Abrupt, unrelated tech references ("GPS/AI recalibrated") interrupt narrative logic.
[STRUCTURE]: Mild disjoint between artistic style description and "CHAPTER" header without clear transitional link.
